title: Figma plugin: Aksel Icons
description: A Figma plugin to easily insert icons from the Aksel design system.

title: Aksel Design System
description: Aksel is an open source design system used in production by NAV's internal and external applications. Accessibility is a core value of the design system, as it will be used by the Norwegian public.

title: Mangfold i Mai website
description: A festival with focus on universal design of ICT.

title: New unemployment benefits application
description: The application uses a new backend system, developed to make the process of applying for unemployment benefits more efficient and fair. The new frontend is built using the Aksel design system. It's currently behind a login.

title: Vipps Donate
description: Vipps Donate was a proof of concept to test a new way for charities to receive donations using the existing Vipps platform.
